Kanjuruhan Diusulkan Sebagai Venue Piala Dunia U-20, Ini Kata Manajemen Arema
04 Nov 2019, 22:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajemen Arema FC angkat bicara soal kemungkinan digunakannya kandang mereka, Stadion Kanjuruhan Kabupaten Malang, sebagai salah satu venue gelaran Piala Dunia U-20 2021 mendatang. Mereka mengaku ada beberapa hal yang harus dibenahi jika nantinya Kanjuruhan dipilih sebagai salah satu venue.
"Kami sudah sempat berbicara dengan Sekjen PSSI, Ratu Tisha, yang intens berkomunikasi dengan FIFA, soal venue," ucap General Manager Arema, Ruddy Widodo.
"Persyaratan utamanya, stadion harus tertutup dan single seat. Selain itu, aksesnya juga dekat dengan tol. Venue juga harus memiliki akses training ground," sambungnya.
Ruddy sendiri mengaku siap jika nantinya Kanjuruhan dipugar untuk memenuhi sejumlah persyaratan tersebut. Manajer berusia 48 tahun ini menyebut Arema akan sementara mencari kandang lain.
"Kalau dipugar ya tentu kami nggak bisa bermain di sini untuk sementara waktu. Kami mungkin akan main di Gajayana,"
Sebelumnya, nama Kanjuruhan diusulkan sebagai salah satu venue gelaran Piala Dunia U-20. Stadion ini diusulkan untuk menggantikan Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo, Surabaya.
Usulan ini dilontarkan oleh Gubernur Jawa Timur, Khofifah Indar Parawansa. Dia mengusulkan Kanjuruhan, alih-alih Stadion Gelora Bung Tomo, yang dinilainya berbau sampah.

Kanjuruh Proposed As U-20 World Cup Venue, This Said Arema Management
Nov 04 2019, 22:56 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arema FC management spoke about the possibility of using their enclosure, Kanjuruhan Stadium, Malang Regency, as one of the upcoming U-20 World Cup 2021 venues. They claimed that there were some things that needed to be addressed if Kanjempuan was chosen as one of the venues.
"We have had a chance to talk with PSSI Secretary General, Ratu Tisha, who is intensely communicating with FIFA, about the venue," said Arema General Manager Ruddy Widodo.
"The main requirement, the stadium must be closed and single seat. In addition, access is also close to the toll road. Venue must also have access to training ground," he continued.
Ruddy himself claimed to be ready if later Kanjempuan was restored to meet a number of these requirements. The 48-year-old manager said Arema will be temporarily looking for another cage.
"If we restore, of course we can't play here for a while. We might play at Gajayana,"
Previously, the name Kanjempuan was proposed as one of the venues for the U-20 World Cup. The stadium is proposed to replace the Gelora Bung Tomo Stadium, Surabaya.
This proposal was made by the Governor of East Java, Khofifah Indar Parawansa. He proposed Kanjempuan, instead of the Bung Tomo Gelora Stadium, which he considered smelled of garbage.
